strategy.name: read-text-file
strategy.description: Reads the contents of a textfile.

strategy.name: read-text-from-stream
strategy.description: Reads all characters until EOF. The stream is not closed.

strategy.name: read-text-line
strategy.description: Reads the next line of text in stream. Line is ended by newline or EOF.

strategy.name: filter-text-file
strategy.description:
Filters the contents of a textfile character chunk by character chunk.
'done' determines when a chunk is complete should fail to indicate completeness
'more' transforms current chunck after adding next character should always succeed
Note that the charachters in a chunk are in reverse order.
